ModMetaData.name: High Density Hydroponics Realism Patch
ModMetaData.description: This mod rebalances the High Density Hydroponics mod by Yumemirareru so that the costs are more inline with vanilla hydroponics basins and sun lamps. Now rather than not only being a cheaper per plant option, it is roughly equivalent to the base game, with a little more high end materials to glue it all together. It also increases power requirements and time to build to match, with a buff to HP to make your now quite large investment a bit less likely to break.
ModMetaData.author: romancase
